item.title: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking now has memory and Google apps integration
item.description: Google makes Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental more personal by connecting more Google apps and services.

item.title: Keywords Studios provides AI-assisted innovation for game devs
item.description: Keywords Studios, the international provider of external development for games and entertainment, is launching Keywords Studios AI Solutions.

item.title: Cohere targets global enterprises with new highly multilingual Command A model requiring only 2 GPUs
item.description: Command A from Cohere offers faster speeds, a larger context window, improved multilingual handling, and lower deployment costs.
